casebody.data:
MCC OUTDOOR, LLC d/b/a Fairway Outdoor Advertising Triangle East
v.
THE TOWN OF FRANKLINTON BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS. No. 268P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. M. Greg Crumpler, Rocky Mount, for Town of Franklin Bd. of Comm. Betty S. Waller, Cary, for MCC Outdoor.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 2nd day of June 2005 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
